oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Tandy Rice Interviewed by Bob Allen in 1990 Side One
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of Bob Allen interviewing Tandy Rice. The recording takes place on 9-19-90.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tandy Rice
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Side One - (0:06) -- Tandy Rice discusses returning home from the armed services. Tandy discusses the origin of the eagle symbol. (1:10) -- Tandy Rice brought the same eagle from his old church to Top Billing. (1:52) -- Bob Allen asks Tandy Rice about his connection to Franklin. (4:50) -- Tandy Rice discusses his relationship with Sam Fleming. (6:45) -- Bob Allen asks Tandy Rice about his salesman work. (10:28) -- Tandy Rice describes the business and assets of Top Billing. (14:30) -- Continuation of office tours. (18:26) -- Continuation of interview. (20:00) -- Tandy Rice discusses the environment of his business. (23:33) -- Tandy Rice describes receiving a call from Steve Mayer on behalf of Fred Sullivan.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Rice, Tandy;
